pkgmetadata.longdescription: Designing Stated Preference Experiments // Contemporary software commonly used to design stated preference experiments are expensive and the code is closed source. This is a free software package with an easy to use interface to make flexible stated preference experimental designs using state-of-the-art methods. For an overview of stated choice experimental design theory, see e.g., Rose, J. M. Bliemer, M. C. J. (2014) in Hess S. Daly. A. doi:10.4337/9781781003152. The package website can be accessed at https://spdesign.edsandorf.me.
